title: 21st-Century Game-Based Learning Object Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of game elements and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals who need to improve creative thinking skills for solving social issues; they possess digital device utilization capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a game-based learning design framework integrating Flow Theory, 21CLD, and the MDA model
Learners can develop game-based learning scenarios for social problem-solving in three stages (goal-mechanics-assessment)
Learners can identify and apply over five game elements that promote creativity and critical thinking
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
